taskbody.context: System Admin can add Directory URL field to the Directory Site object.

step.cmd: Select double click on Site Directory Object
Navigate to Custom Fields and Relationships. Click New button.
Mark FoRmula Data Type. Click Next.
Enter Field Label name: Directory URL. Tab. The Field Name field auto-populates

Build the Directory URL expression in the Advanced Formula text box.
Enter single quote
Paste Community Domain URL for your org: https://communityurl.force.com
Follow with the following text: /DirectoryApi__Directory?autonumber='
Paste Site Directory Name (e.g. SD-0000000)
Add single quote to close expression
Click Check Syntax button to confirm logic
If there are no errors, click Save
